title: Online Scaffolding Course Based on Self-Regulated and Co-Regulated Learning for Formative Peer Assessment (FPA)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific writing skills and peer review experience
context.additional_context: Utilization of online scaffolding tools for applying FPA (Functional Problem Analysis) in science writing projects

learning_goals: Learners can provide specific and actionable feedback to peers on scientific writing assignments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze peer feedback and incorporate it into their own writing with over 70% implementation rate
Learners can set goals and develop plans in the FPA process with over 90% proficiency using self-regulation and co-regulation strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
